description: Enterprise techniques used by CrossRAT, ATT&CK software S0235 v1.1
name: CrossRAT (S0235)

techniques.comment: [CrossRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0235) uses run keys for persistence on Windows
[CrossRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0235) creates a Launch Agent on macOS.(Citation: Lookout Dark Caracal Jan 2018)
[CrossRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0235) can list all files on a system.
[CrossRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0235) is capable of taking screen captures.(Citation: Lookout Dark Caracal Jan 2018)
